message: You're in luck! I have a high-quality product available for the special price of $100. It's a rare gem, and I'm confident you'll love it. Many of my previous customers have been thrilled with their purchases, and I'm sure you will be too. Would you like to take it home?
I'd like to take the product, but I'm a cautious buyer. I'll take it, but I'm not making any promises about being thrilled with it.

As you can see, I've had a 2-for-2 streak so far with high-quality products, and I'm confident that this one will continue the trend. Would you like to take a chance on it?

Great point! I'm happy to share the statistics with you. I'm proud to say that this is a strong indicator of the quality of my products, and I'm confident that this next product will also meet your expectations.
